name: the Hapless Cupit
description:
use WASD to move, right mouse button to shoot and middle mouse button to see what to shoot on.  You can also see the guidance by clicking the gear in the upper left corner of the game.

     

The hapless cupit is a shooting game, in which the player plays as a cupit who has never been able to complete his work target. Players need to shoot two people who want to be in love in a relatively short time to make them actually in love. Various mechanisms in the level can be use to influence these people who do not want to be in love.
